specifications: 8.5cm x 13cm, X-Pac VX21 material, YKK zippers
notes: Fits most pockets. Great wallet replacement. Have been using this for 6 months to carry cards, cash, car key, and a small flashlight.
Too big when full for most pockets. Material which isn't stiff enough to keep shape, and also contorts in an unpleasant way when pouch is filled.
specifications: 12cm x 9cm, X-Pac VX21 material, YKK zippers

notes: Too small to carry an electric razor or electric toothbrush, but too large for only essentials. It's a high quality bag, but I don't use it.

This toiletry bag is on the larger side but I like it a lot it. Good for a longer trip or organization. I can fit all my toiletries in this bag including an electric razor and electric toothbrush. Has a built in hook to hang it up.
specifications: Weight: 248g, Volume: 2.5L, Material: 100% recycled Weatherproof 200D nylon Versa Shell™

notes: Offers great organization and ease of access with according style design and tons of pockets. Easy to organize essential tech items. I use it all the time.
specifications: Weight: 288g, Volume: 2L, Material: 100% recycled Weatherproof 400D nylon Versa Shell™

notes: It is extremely easy to add and remove keys, but durability is questionable.
specifications: Leather. Holds 3 to 9 standard keys

notes: Magnetic Key Ring. Possibly a very convenient way to carry keys.
Wallet that can also carry keys
Heavy-weight cotton. Binding at the collar helps the neckline keep its shape.

notes: SUPIMA® cotton that is softer and more durable than regular cotton. This shirt resembles a classic t-shirt but has a more refined look.
specifications: 100% Cotton. Machine wash cold.

notes: THERE IS A NEW VERSION AVAILABLE (ZOWIE EC1-DW) - The following applies to the EC1-CW:  Wireless gaming mouse. Comfortable shape, good for larger hands. Good battery life. Convenient charging dock. No software required. Only complaint is the weird mouse feet shape which makes it difficult to find replacement feet.
specifications: 60g, DPI: 400 / 800 / 1600 / 3200, Report Rate: 125 / 500 / 1000 Hz, 3360 sensor, 1000Hz polling rate,  3370 Sensor, 2.4G Wireless

notes: Ideal keyboard layout (80%, dedicated arrow key section). Analog input with optical switches provides an advantage in gaming. Software is accessed through a web application.
specifications: 80% layout, Optical switches, 1.5mm actuation point, 3.6mm bottom out, RGB backlight, USB-C connection

notes: Large mousepad with a smooth surface. Should be replaced regularly.
specifications: Size: 470 x 390 mm , Thickness: 3.5mm, Material: Cloth surface with rubber base

notes: It's beautiful. Glossy panel could be a problem if your room is bright.
specifications: Size: 27 inch, Resolution: 2560 x 1440, Refresh Rate: 360Hz, Response Time: 0.03ms, Panel Type: QD-OLED, Video Ports: 1x DisplayPort 1.4, 1x HDMI 2.0

notes: Compact flashlight that runs on AA batteries. Has a good brightness range and is very portable, but the UI kinda bad.
specifications: Max Output: 550 lumens, Beam Distance: 130 meters, Battery: 1x AA or 14500 rechargeable lithium-ion battery, Material: Aluminum alloy, Waterproof: IP68

notes: Compact flashlight that runs on AAA batteries. Very portable, but the UI is not great.
specifications: Max Output: 200 lumens, Beam Distance: 62 meters, Battery: 1x AAA battery, Material: Aluminum alloy, Waterproof: IPX8

notes: Clamshell design allows for easy packing and maximum storage. The 26+6 means it can expand from 26L to 32L. It has a laptop compartment and a front pocket for easy access to essentials. Highly recommended by the r/OneBag community.
specifications: Volume: 26L (expandable to 32L), Weight: 1.85lbs, Material: 100% recycled 300D polyester w/ ripstop.

notes: A compact multi-tool with a good selection of tools. The build quality is excellent. I don't need all the tools, but the one handed opening makes it so smooth to use compared to other multi-tools.
specifications: Weight: 243.81g, Closed Length: 4.25in, Blade Length: 2.76in, 20 Tools including knife, pliers, wire cutters, bit driver, etc.), Material: Stainless steel with a black oxide finish. Knife is MagnaCut steel.

notes: Comfortable. Passable Mic/Sound Quality. Manually turning off the headset is annoying. Having to plug a USB-C cable into headset to charge when done is annoying and an extra cable to manage. CORSAIR iCUE software is required for full functionality (cringe).
specifications: Weight: 360g, Battery Life: 24hr w/ RGB | 65hr w/o RGB, Connectivity: 2.4 GHz Wireless USB-A dongle, Bluetooth, Wired USB-A to USB-C, Features: Customizable RGB lighting, Dolby Atmos support, On-ear volume control, Microphone with flip-to-mute functionality.

notes: A very well designed headset. I find the headband very uncomfortable, so I had to modify it, but this aside I think this is the best wireless gaming headset. Mic quality is passable. Closed back but has a very open sound compared to similar products. Comes with a charging station with wireless charging. When one is done using the headset, they simply place it in the charging station, which turns it off and charges it. The charging station has a spot for the 2.4GHz wireless dongle, but it can be easily removed to place in another device without having to use the dock. The headset EQ and other preferences can be adjusted through a web-based application, so it doesn't require installing GARBAGE SOFTWARE on one's PC. ALSO, not only can one adjust PC volume with a dial on the headset, but it also has PLAY/PAUSE/SKIP/BACK buttons for media control. WHAT MORE COULD YOU ASK FOR?
specifications: Weight: 338g, Battery Life: 24hr w/ RGB | 40hr w/o RGB, Connectivity: 2.4 GHz Wireless USB-A dongle, Bluetooth 5.3, Wired USB-A to USB-C, Features: Customizable RGB lighting, On-ear volume/media control, On-ear button to swap EQ profiles, Microphone with flip-to-mute functionality.

notes: A comfortable and durable belt that is really easy to put on or take off. I wear it every day.
specifications: Width: 1.5in, Material: Stretchy nylon belt with aluminum buckle, Adjustable size, Lifetime warranty.

notes: Has good size pockets and loops but its too big for most pockets, and too inconvenient to access items within. Could be good for medical supplies or other small items that don't need to be accessed frequently.
specifications: 1050-Denier water and abrasion resistant light-weight ballistic nylon fabric, Main compartment Dimensions: 4"(L) x 1"(W) x 6"(H), Weight: 113 grams

notes: Large but the pouch is very thin which makes it really hard to stuff that isn't very thin.
specifications: 1050-Denier water and abrasion resistant light-weight ballistic nylon fabric, Main compartment Dimensions: 5"(L) x 1"(W) x 7"(H)

notes: This pouch is too big for a pocket but its very nice for small tools or other items that need to be organized together. It has many pockets and loops for organization.
specifications: 1050-Denier water and abrasion resistant light-weight ballistic nylon fabric, Overall size: 4"(L) x 2.5"(W) x 6"(H), Weight: 139 grams

notes: Poorly designed. The big pocket is nice, but the small pockets are all weird sizes and the band is not elastic so if you try to hold an item with it, it bends the entire pouch.
specifications: Material: 500D Oxford fabric, Dimensions:5.90in(H) x 3.70in(W) x 0.55in(T), Weight:51g

notes: A compact and portable precision screwdriver with 24 bits. The build quality is excellent and it has a magnetic tip for easy bit changes. The bits are stored inside the pen, making it very convenient to carry.
specifications: 24 S2-Steel Precision Bits, Aluminum Alloy Body
